title: Rank Reset Confirmation
body:
So, I'm just a little confused, I went 4 and 6 in my promos, which isn't great but not terrible and yet, I got demoted 8 ranks below where I was at during preseason, "plat 4 to Silver 2" which seems super extreme for a "Soft Reset" to me. I was just wondering if that seems right? Like am I just complaining or is there actually some system that screwed me over.

I love League of Legends, I can deal with awful, toxic teammates, but I feel robbed of my hard work.

replies.body: With the new season everything is getting shuffled down so everyone is likely to find that they placed lower than the previous season.  A soft reset for the season as well as placement matches adjusting will pave the way for divisions/tiers and what they mean for the season.  You're not alone, a lot of players will be doing the climb with you!
